author: USA TODAY, Sara M Moniuszko, USA TODAY
title: Oprah Winfrey explains why Stedman Graham is quarantining in their guest house
description: Oprah Winfrey is sharing what home life has been like for her and partner Stedman Graham amid the coronavirus.
content:
